channel.title: How to make class client read class CommandHandler?

item.title: How to make class client read class CommandHandler?
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

It’s private, and in your client; where it sends the code make it call this methid instead of the regular one that is called.

item.title: How to make class client read class CommandHandler?
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

Class CommandHandler code:

[code]import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.BufferedWriter;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;

public class CommandHandler {

private void customCommand(String command) {
if(command.startsWith(“test”)) {
System.out.println(“This code is a test.”);
}
}
}[/code]

And I’ve tried to make private void customCommand read it through a void, but it’s not working.

Any suggestions?

Read full topic
item.source: How to make class client read class CommandHandler?
